thread.title: Exhibit honouring songwriter Paul Simon to open at the Jewish Museum of Maryland in Baltimore
thread.title_full: Exhibit honouring songwriter Paul Simon to open at the Jewish Museum of Maryland in Baltimore - Winnipeg Free Press

author: The Associated Press
title: Exhibit honouring songwriter Paul Simon to open at the Jewish Museum of Maryland in Baltimore
text:
BALTIMORE - The Jewish Museum of Maryland in Baltimore is preparing to host a travelling exhibit dedicated to the music and lyrics of one of America's greatest songwriters.
The exhibit, entitled "Paul Simon: Words and Music," will feature original lyric sheets, guitars and clothing belonging to Simon, as well as autobiographical films and videos of performances.
The exhibit is scheduled to open to the public on Oct. 11, and is coming to Baltimore after 11 months at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in Cleveland. Making its first stop on a nationwide tour, the exhibit will be on display in Baltimore through Jan. 18.
